Reference

Krig

krig_lst() GetKrigedSoil()

Krige soil data following the methodology of the John et al. (2007).

krig_auto_params()

Find "best" variogram parameters.

krig_breaks()

Sequence of n exponentially increasing values.

Torus translation

tt_test_lst() torusonesp.all()

Torus Translation Test to determine habitat associations of tree species.

abund_index()

Count rows by quadrat-index.

extract_gridsize() extract_plotdim()

Extract plot dimensions from habitat data.

dist_in_torus()

A general function to calculate distances in a n-dimensional toroid.

Generics

abund_index()

Count rows by quadrat-index.

as_krig() as_krig_lst()

Coerce to class krig_lst

A general function to calculate distances in a n-dimensional toroid.

Extract plot dimensions from habitat data.

Find "best" variogram parameters.

krig_lst() GetKrigedSoil()

Krige soil data following the methodology of the John et al. (2007).

luquillo_habitat luquillo_elevation luquillo_tree6_random luquillo_stem6_random

Datasets from fgeo.data.

luquillo_top3_sp

A tiny dataset from Luquillo of the three most abundant species.

soil_fake

Fake soil data with multiple elements.

soil_random

Soil data for examples.

summary(<krig>)

Summary of krig_lst() results.

to_df(<krig_lst>)

Dataframe the output of krig_lst().

to_df()

Restructure data as a dataframe.

to_df(<tt_lst>)

Dataframe objects of class tt_*.

tt_test_lst() torusonesp.all()

Torus Translation Test to determine habitat associations of tree species.
